title: No changes for Geno Smith
content:
New York Jets QB Geno Smith (jaw) has no changes to his timetable, according to head coach Todd Bowles. ‘It’s going to take a while,’ Bowles said. 
  Tip: Smith ($5,300, 10.6% of cap) shouldn't be on anyone's fantasy radar for the time being. There's a chance he could regain the starting role at some point when he's healthy, but who knows when that'll be. Fitzpatrick ($5,500, 11.0% of cap) will continue to start in the meantime, but he doesn't have much daily upside at all.  Read More Geno Smith News
